attributes.action: Stop companies from using direct debit mandates of companies they have taken over without getting new authorisation first. Stop companies from setting up a new direct debit without a new mandate once the old one has been cancelled.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present if a company is taken over the new company collects monies on the existing direct debit without permission of the account holder.
Also if a direct debit is cancelled by the account holder, the company can still open a new direct debit without the account holders permission leaving the account open to abuse and fraud.
